radiographic_examinations.findings: No abnormalities or evidence of calcification.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progressively developed small peripapillary angioid streaks.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Characteristic elastic fiber changes featuring a considerable accumulation of clumped fibers in the mid dermis that stained black with von Kossa stain.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No clinical signs of progression in 2009.

radiographic_examinations.findings: No abnormalities and no evidence of calcification.
Swollen and irregularly clumped elastic fibers in the mid dermis.
